message: Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more
I understand you wanting a larger share, but that offer wasn't fair to me. Let's settle this quickly - this offer benefits us both.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more
Alice, this is becoming ridiculous.  The longer this goes on, the less we both get.  I'm offering a fair 50/50 split to end this now.
You're right, this is taking too long. But I still think I deserve a bit more. This is my final offer
